data.description:
Discover a new world of music with HyperSpace Music, the ultimate VR app for Oculus headsets. HyperSpace Music revolutionizes your auditory experience by transforming your favorite MP3 tracks into breathtaking visual masterpieces.

Simply load your MP3 files into the default "music" folder on your headset, and let HyperSpace Music do the rest. Each song is brought to life through stunning, real-time visualizers that respond dynamically to the beats, rhythms, and melodies of your music. Whether you're grooving to pop, rocking out to metal, or relaxing with classical tunes, HyperSpace Music creates an immersive visual landscape that complements every genre.

Dive into a vibrant universe where sound and sight merge, offering an unparalleled sensory adventure. Customize your experience with various visual themes and effects, ensuring that no two journeys are ever the same. HyperSpace Music is perfect for music lovers, VR enthusiasts, and anyone looking to elevate their listening experience.

App Created by Krish T & Vicente M - Future Productions Films
Video Backgrounds - Björn Richter & TellSoto
Space Cover Art - Photo by Felix Mittermeier

LINKS:
http://www.future-productions.co.uk
https://dietechrecruiter.de/author/bj%C3%B6rn-richter/ 
https://www.pexels.com/photo/blue-universe-956981/

changelog.change_log:
Dear Hyperspace Travelers,

We've just made your journey through the music cosmos even more mesmerizing! 

In this update, Visualizer 6 has undergone a complete transformation—embrace the flow with the new Organic Green visualizer, designed to sync your music with nature's rhythm.

We've also made some under-the-hood tweaks to boost performance and ensure a smoother, more immersive experience. Keep exploring and enjoy the enhanced vibes!

In the next few weeks we have some really cool updates coming, so please stay tuned!

Safe travels,
K -The Hyperspace Music VR Team

Dear Hyperspace Travellers,

Today we are proud to add a further 3 viualizers to Hyperspace Music!

We have been working non-stop to bring you a collection of truly unique and mesmerizing visuals. In the weeks to come we will add more visuals and are currently tweaking the ones we have for optimal performance and quality.

stay tuned for some really cool stuff coming soon!

K

Dear Space Travelers!

I have been working constantly to make this app better and have some exciting new updates planned in the next few weeks.

In this Update:

1) The SR8 SpaceFighters are now flying in battle formation in Visualizer 2.

2) Jet engine effects have been added.

3) Minor tweaks to the scene transitions.

We really have been working hard to make this app better and better. 

Thanks for joining us on this journey through space and through sound.

K

Dear Friends,

I have been working endlessly to make this app better. Please bear with us as we make more updates to the app later this month.

So far:

1) The Hyperspace Intro video is now in 360 format.

2) An SR8 Spacefighter ship has been added to one of the scenes. (We will add in more ships and interior details in the next update)

3) The visualizers now have a simple fade transition to smoothen scene changes.

Stay Tuned for a lot more exciting updates!

K

Dear All,

Thanks for joining us on the launch to Hyperspace!

We have a few exciting updates planned over the next few days, so please stay tuned.

We listened to some of your feedback and are currently relentlessly working on the rest of the changes.

For now this update brings:

1) A brand new visualizer inspired by the popular "Milkdrop" visualizer. This visualizer is called "Stardust" and features some cool abstract effects. This will only get better with time!

2) Web browsing and some Android 2D apps may work within app for Quest 2 and up.

Stay tuned, we will rollout more updates in a matter of days!

K
